fields.summary: Windows: App crashes when Ti.Network.Socket.TCP fails to connect

comments.body:
Verified fix, {{Error}} callback is now invoked when the app fails to connect to the server and the App no longer crashes. 
This was tested with the test coded provided by [~gmathews] in https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile_windows/pull/933. 

*Environment*
